data.title: Gervaise (1956): Sands Films Cinema Club online presentation
data.text:
This page is to obtain access to the Sands Films Cinema Club presentation ONLINE

To attend in person, please CLICK HERE

Sands Films Cinema Club season of screen adaptations of the work of Emile Zola.

Based on Émile Zola’s L’assommoir, Gervaise is an uncompromising depiction of a lowly laundress’s struggles to deal with an alcoholic husband while running her own business. The film was nominated for an Oscar, and the indomitable Maria Schell earned best actress honors at the Venice Film Festival.
